publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1218 Cathy Jamieson: Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager—That the Parliament welcomes the appointment of Cumnock-born George Burley as the manager of the Scottish national football team; recognises his contribution and achievements as both a player and a manager, and wishes him and the players well in the qualification campaign for the 2010 World Cup in South Africa.

S3M-1218 Cathy Jamieson: Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager—That the Parliament welcomes the appointment of Cumnock-born George Burley as the manager of the Scottish national football team; recognises his contribution and achievements as both a player and a manager, and wishes him and the players well in the qualification campaign for the 2010 World Cup in South Africa. Supported by: Sandra White*, Andy Kerr*, Aileen Campbell*, Alasdair Allan*, Rhona Brankin*, James Kelly*, Liam McArthur*, John Lamont*, Kenneth Gibson*, Murdo Fraser*, John Park*, Jamie McGrigor*, Mike Pringle*, Jackie Baillie*, Stuart McMillan*, Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*, Bill Butler*, George Foulkes*, Karen Gillon*, Sarah Boyack*, John Scott*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Elaine Murray*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Charlie Gordon*, Ross Finnie*, Bashir Ahmad*, Trish Godman*
S3M-1218 Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager (lodged on 24 January 2008) Alex Neil*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Cathy Peattie*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-1218 Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager (lodged on 24 January 2008) Jim Hume*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1218 Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager (lodged on 24 January 2008) Dave Thompson*
S3M-1218 Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager (lodged on 24 January 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-1218 Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager (lodged on 24 January 2008) Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-1218 Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager (lodged on 24 January 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-1218 Appointment of George Burley as the Scotland National Football Team Manager (lodged on 24 January 2008) Jack McConnell*
